General.Name: Optimum Ventures Ltd
General.Description: Optimum Ventures Ltd., together with its subsidiary, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties. The company has an option to acquire a 100% interest in the Mineral Basin Claims with 4 federally located mineral claims; and in the Riverside claims with 8 patented mineral claims situated in Hyder Mining District, State of Alaska, the United States. It also has an option agreement to acquire an 80% interest in the Harry Property which three contiguous mineral claims covering 1,333 hectares located in the Skeena Mining Division of British Columbia. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1030 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2Y3
